faq.label: FAQ
faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does the diagnostic take?
faq.a1: 7 minutes. You answer a series of questions about your life, goals, and birth data.
faq.a2: Yes, the base analysis is completely free. You'll receive a PDF with your profile and key insights.
faq.q3: How accurate is the AI diagnostic?
faq.a3: We combine Human Design, astrology, numerology, and behavioral analysis for maximum precision.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: CODE: ABUNDANCE ("we", "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable Bulgarian law.
privacy.dataCollectedText: We collect the following categories of personal data:
privacy.dataItem1: Identification data: name, email address, phone number (optional)
privacy.dataItem2: Birth data: date of birth, time of birth (optional), city of birth — required for Human Design, astrology, and numerology calculations
privacy.dataItem3: Diagnostic responses: life area ratings, priorities, goals, commitment level, income
privacy.dataItem4: Technical data: IP address, browser type, device information, cookies
privacy.dataItem5: Payment data: processed entirely through Stripe — we do not store credit card information
privacy.howUsedItem1: Generate your personalized AI analysis (Human Design, astrology, numerology)
privacy.howUsedItem2: Send your diagnostic report and email communications
privacy.howUsedItem4: Improve our services and user experience
privacy.legalBasisText: We process your data based on: (a) your explicit consent given when completing the diagnostic; (b) contract performance — providing the requested service; (c) legitimate interest — improving the platform and preventing abuse.
privacy.thirdPartiesText: We share data with the following service providers who act as data processors:
privacy.thirdParty1: Supabase — database hosting and authentication (EU servers)
privacy.thirdParty2: OpenAI — AI analysis processing (data is anonymized before sending)
privacy.retentionText: We retain your personal data for 2 years after your last activity or until you request deletion. Payment data is retained as required by accounting regulations (5 years).
privacy.rightsText: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
privacy.right1: Access — obtain a copy of your personal data
privacy.right3: Erasure — request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")
privacy.right4: Portability — receive your data in a machine-readable format
privacy.right5: Objection — object to processing for direct marketing
privacy.right6: Withdraw consent — at any time, without affecting the lawfulness of processing before withdrawal
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit (TLS) and at rest, access controls, and regular security audits.
privacy.cookiesText: We use only essential cookies for site functionality and analytics cookies to improve user experience. You can manage your cookie preferences through the consent banner.
privacy.contactText: For questions about data privacy or to exercise your rights, please contact us at:
privacy.supervisoryText: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the Commission for Personal Data Protection (CPDP) — cpdp.bg

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introText: These Terms of Service govern the use of the CODE: ABUNDANCE platform and its services. By using the platform, you accept these terms.
terms.serviceText: CODE: ABUNDANCE provides personalized AI diagnostics based on Human Design, astrology, and numerology methodologies. The service includes:
terms.serviceItem1: Free 7-minute diagnostic with basic profile generation
terms.serviceItem2: Paid full report with detailed analysis and 90-day action plan
terms.serviceItem3: VIP coaching packages with personal sessions
terms.disclaimerText: The diagnostics and analyses are for informational and entertainment purposes only. They do not constitute medical, psychological, financial, or legal advice. Always consult a qualified professional for specific decisions.
terms.userText: By using the platform, you agree to:
terms.userItem2: Not use the service for illegal purposes
terms.userItem3: Not attempt to access other users' accounts
terms.userItem4: Not redistribute the analysis as your own product
terms.paymentText: Prices are listed in euros (EUR) and include applicable taxes. Payments are processed securely through Stripe. We reserve the right to change prices, but changes do not affect completed orders.
terms.refundText: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for paid reports. If you are not satisfied, contact us within 30 days of purchase and we will refund 100% of the amount, no questions asked.
terms.ipText: All platform content — text, design, algorithms, trademarks, and logos — is the property of CODE: ABUNDANCE or its licensors. Reports you receive are licensed for personal use only. Copying, distributing, or reselling content is prohibited.
terms.liabilityText: To the maximum extent permitted by law, CODE: ABUNDANCE shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from use of the service. Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid for the relevant service.
terms.terminationText: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the service for violation of these terms. You may terminate your account at any time by contacting us.
terms.changesText: We reserve the right to update these terms. For material changes, we will notify you via email or through a notice on the platform.
terms.lawText: These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Bulgaria. All disputes shall be resolved by the competent courts in Sofia, Bulgaria.
terms.contactText: For questions about these terms, please contact us at:
